dict.acceptation: 打扰；干扰；使烦恼；使恼怒；

sent.orig: Annoy irritate bother irk vex provoke aggravate peeve rile.
sent.trans: Annoy使生气，使烦恼，打搅，干扰。

sent.orig: He is a good defender who knows how to annoy players.
sent.trans: 他是一个好的防守球员，知道怎么去扰乱对手。

sent.orig: The naughty boy sometimes does things on purpose to annoy me.
sent.trans: 这调皮的孩子有时故意做些事来气我。

sent.orig: Otherwise, does not speak the principle, a rage sips the vinegar, must annoy the repugnance.
sent.trans: 反之，毫不讲理，大发雷霆地呷醋，必惹反感。

sent.orig: His opponent's delaying tactics are designed to annoy him and put him off.
sent.trans: 对手的拖延术是故意恼他，使他分心。
